@humantorchid .. first of all u need to know the use of tags 

whatever word you type in 'tags' , when that word is typed in the search box then your torrent can be seen .. else not 

it is normally useless to type the title name as a tag.. coz the torrent appear anyway

but if you type just "Simpsons" in search box your torrent would not appear .. so that would be a good tag .. hope u understood the need for tags

also .. separate tags by commas .. look at the tag you used , you didn't use comma separator hence hence the tag was wasted

tags for this torrents .. eg : Simpsons,season 24 (this would be a waste bcoz it's already in the title)

... eg for tags : Simpsons, complete season, 480p (if it is) , (also adding compatibility devices is a good idea)
like iPad,WDTV,iPod, etc. etc..

also you could have added 480p in title
ideal title wud be : The Simpsons complete season 24 HDTV x264

HDTV and x264 are that necessary .. but if it is xvid ..always add it in title ,, people love xvid in avi format

phew .. I shud stop commenting such long ones ... OW my fingers ... hope it helped
